extensionDescription.message: An add-on allowing mass item selling on Steam

controls_button_sell.description: Button title for controls panel that brings up the confirmation modal

controls_button_toggle_visible.description: Button title for controls panel that sets checkboxes on the current inventory page checked, if there are ANY unchecked, and sets all unchecked if all are checked

controls_selling.description: Text on button placeholder when selected items are being sold

modal_button_clear.description: Title for button used to clear selected items list and close the modal

modal_button_close.description: Title for button used close the modal

modal_button_sell.description: Title for button used to confirm selling selected items in modal

modal_price_modifier_median.description: Title for radiobutton to use average price taken from steam price info for selling items

modal_price_modifier_multiply.description: Title for radiobutton to use (average price * multiplier) for selling items

modal_price_modifier_custom.description: Title for radiobutton to use custom prices set by user for selling items

modal_price_loading.description: Message shown while item price is being fetched

modal_items_empty.description: Text displayed in modal when no items were selected to be sold

guide_purpose.message: Selling one card at a time may be very time consuming, this extension enhances Steam web-version inventory to allow mass item selling

guide_run_0.message: To use the extension navigate to:
guide_run_0.description: Parts of the message clarifying how to use the extension

guide_run_1.message: Select cards you want to sell then click the 'Sell selected items' button. A modal will appear, listing all selected items. You can modify desired sell price using radiobuttons and input fields. Once you are done, press the 'Sell' button to confirm.

guide_issues_information.message: Should you encounter a bug or have any suggestions on how to improve the extension
guide_issues_information.description: First part of the message, telling users where to address if they want to contact the dev on related issues

guide_issues_link.message: create a new issue on github
guide_issues_link.description: Second part of the message, link text
